Class: Query

Query

new Query(conditions, options, object)

Represents a SELECT query.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
conditions Object | String | Number A criteria object, prebuilt predicate, or primitive pk value.
options Object Control query behavior.
Properties
Name Type Description
columns String SELECT list.
limit Number LIMIT clause value.
offset Number OFFSET clause value.
only Boolean True to restrict query to the target table, ignoring any descendant tables.
order Object Key-value dictionary of ordering fields and direction.
orderBody Boolean True to apply options.order to the document in the table's 'body' field instead of to the table itself.
build Boolean True to return the SQL *instead of* running it.
document Boolean This is a query against a document table.
single Boolean True to return a single object instead of an array.
stream Boolean True to return a stream instead of a resultset.
object Object Database object to query.
Source:
  • lib/query/query.js, line 33

Methods

format()

Format a full SQL statement from this Query.
Source:
  • lib/query/query.js, line 83

selectList()

Generate a SELECT list for this Query.
